alert.note: Alert for Branch; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 2:21PM EST until January 25 at 8:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST /7 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. An additional 1 to 2 inches of snowfall is expected into this evening totalling 3 to 6 inches for the entire event. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...From 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ to 8 PM EST /7 PM CST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will likely impact the evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will become lighter by this evening, although blowing and drifting snow in open areas is possible into the evening as gusts surpass 20 mph. Additional but mostly lighter snow is expected tonight into Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
